name: Telegram Drop
description: Sends incoming data to a Telegram chat. Enter bot token and chat ID directly.

inputs.name: message
inputs.description: Message content to send (string or object)

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: Send result with message_id and status

settings.name: chatId
settings.label: Chat ID
settings.description: Telegram chat ID (use @userinfobot to get it, negative for groups)

settings.name: parseMode
settings.label: Parse Mode
settings.description: Message format: HTML, Markdown, MarkdownV2, or empty for plain text

settings.name: prefix
settings.label: Message Prefix
settings.description: Optional prefix to prepend to each message
